key_title: Key to the species of Melicytus

Key to the families of Dicotyledons
Key to the genera of Violaceae

leads.lead_text: Plants with either male or female flowers only; pedicels 3–6 mm long in male flowers; corolla in female plants 1.8–2.5 mm across at widest point. Leaves mostly >20 mm long, >2.5 mm wide, usually with at least 2 teeth per side; lateral nerves usually obvious. Plants usually non-divaricate, with more or less pliant branches, with most branch angles of ca. 45 degrees.

Plants with hermaphroditic flowers only; pedicels 1.5–3 mm long; corolla 3.5–3.8 mm across at widest point. Leaves mostly <20 mm long, <2.0 mm wide, entire, or rarely with 1 tooth per side; lateral nerves usually obscure or absent. Plants divaricate with rigid branches, most branch angles >60 degrees
